abstract: Teenage girls were more likely to alert friends to sales through phone calls or text messages, rather than using Facebook.
snippet: Teenage girls were more likely to alert friends to sales through phone calls or text messages, rather than using Facebook.
lead_paragraph: It is a marketer’s article of faith that the Internet is the best route to a teenager’s cash. Marketers assume that teenage girls chatter about their favorite brands on Facebook and buy items online.

headline.main: Sharing Sales Tips in a Smaller Circle
headline.print_headline: Sharing Sales Tips in a Smaller Circle
